select

from VOTE_HOUSE_INFO
order by ${orderByClause}

order by ${orderByClause}
select sum(info_area) as infoArea,count(1) as houCount, count(distinct build_code) as buildCount from vote_house_info where sect_Id=#{sectId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select a.INFO_ID, a.INFO_ADDR, a.INFO_AREA, a.OWNER_NAME, a.LINK_PHONE, a.CERT_CODE, a.PROP_CODE, a.DIST_NAME, a.SECT_ID, a.SECT_NAME, a.BUILD_CODE, a.UNIT_CODE, a.FLOOR_CODE, a.ROOM_CODE, a.HOUSE_ID, a.CREATE_DATE, a.CREATE_TIME, a.CREATE_WAYS, a.INFO_STATUS, a.INFO_REMARK from VOTE_HOUSE_INFO a,vote_apply_info b where a.info_id = b.info_id and b.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
